title: U.S. consumer Christmas spending habits 2011 to 2013
summary: This grouped bar chart has 5 categories for the x axis of Response representing 2011, 2012, and 2013.
The highest category is found at Spend the same as last Christmas with a mean value of 46.0.
The second highest category is found at Spend less than last Christmas with a mean value of 33.0.

data.Response: Spend the same as last Christmas
